column1: prompt
Write a short description of a key character in a crime novel.
Create a game to teach children basic coding concepts.
Summarize a given article about presidential debates. The article discusses the importance of presidential debates and how they offer a platform for citizens to evaluate candidates.
Create a website interface to help people find jobs.
Construct a timeline of major geological events.
Describe how a virus enters a host cell.
Generate a five-sentence story about Alice waking up late.
Create a spreadsheet using MS Excel to track inventory for a retail store.
Calculate the area of a circle whose radius is 5. 5
Give an example when you would use a linked list data structure.
How is a neural network different from a regular computer program?
Extract a key point from the following article. Recent research has shown that artificial intelligence is advancing rapidly, and that it could have profound implications for the world as we know it.
Generate a two-sentence description of the process of designing a website

Summarize the text in the input field in 1-2 sentences. In this modern day and age the usage of smartphones has become ubiquitous. From playing games to networking to making calls, smartphones are now used for a plethora of tasks.

Paraphrase the sentence
"We spent a lot of time looking at data sets."
Correct the spelling mistake This is a rarly seen sight.
Name the most poisonous snake in the world
Learn new words from this sentence She wrung her hands in apprehension.
Discriminate between these two similar sounding words Its vs. It's
Classify these movies as comedy, drama, or action. Toy Story, Casablanca, Avengers
Create a metaphor comparing life to a game.
Write an article introducing the city of Paris.
Generate an AI-generated Insult

You are asked to summarize the following article in one sentence. Virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR) are advancing at an incredible pace, disrupting the way we experience entertainment, commerce, health care, education, and the workplace.
Explain what is supervised learning
Provide two alternative titles for the following article. The Impact of AI on Education

Rewrite the paragraph in reverse order AI has changed the way that many of us view the world. It has allowed us to visualize and understand data in ways we hadn’t thought possible before. This opens up a whole new world of possibilities.
You are given a sentence, using the sentence rewrite the paragraph using only two of its words AI has made large strides in medical diagnosis.
Describe your morning routine.
Generate a list of numbers that are divisible by both 2 and 5.
What is unique about a hyperbole?
Classify the following statement as true or false. "The planets in our solar system orbit the Sun in the same direction."
Give an example of how gravity affects us in everyday life.
Generate a piece of dialogue for two characters using the following words: "frustrated", "unapologetic", and "toy".
For the given set of numbers, compute their median. 5, 8, 4, 7, 1

Given two quotes, classify the political stance of the quotes. "We must prioritize justice and equality over all else."
"The government should prioritize economic growth."
Given a list of ingredients, suggest one way to cook the dish. Beef, cabbage, carrots, potatoes

Compose a tweet of less than 280 characters based on the given conversation. Person A: "Hey, how are you?"
Person B: "Great! Just got a promotion at work!"
Generate a rap verse of less that 16 bars.
Given a group of people and a situation, suggest an appropriate decision. A group of five friends planning a trip out of town
Given a mathematical expression, simplify it. 3x + 4xy + y - 2x - 3y
Generate two design options for a business card.
Write a comment apologising to a customer for a delay in their delivery.
Categorize each of the following items as either a store-bought item or a handmade item. (1) Candle holder (2) iPhone case (3) Drawer organizer
Select the correct letter in the parentheses. My favorite color is (A) red, (B) purple, (C) yellow.
Generate a hypothetical phone number.
Spell out the given acronym. PC
Edit the highlighted locations in the sentence so they are consistent with each other. I live in the United States of America, but I'm originally from Canada.
Create 20 questions about the topic of space exploration.
Compute the result of 5 + 7.
Suggest one practical activity to help reduce air pollution.
Explain why air pollution is a global problem.

Classify each sentence as formal or informal. "Hey dude, how's it going?"
"Good morning, how can I help you?"
Say something to cheer up a person who is feeling down.
Create a procedure to assemble a sandwich.
Infer the symbolism from this excerpt. The sound of the ocean waves in the background was like a lullaby, washing away all worries and dissipating into the night.
Rearrange these words to form a gramatically correct sentence. flies woman an the old
Name two products Apple sells. "<noinput>"
Generate an algorithm for counting the number of different languages spoken within a country.

Based on the following data, predict the price of the product next week. Product Price (week1):$ 150
Product Price (week2):$ 170
Reorganize the given phrases into a well-structured sentence. Yesterday / windy / it was
Suggest some tips to reduce energy costs at home.
Generate a hashtag for an upcoming event. London Coffee Festival
For the given tweet, determine the sentiment. The new pizza place in town has great deals
Find the third number in the given sequence. 2, 4, 6, 8
How many years have passed since 1950?
What is the main character of the movie, "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs"?
Write an equation to convert Celsius to Fahrenheit.
Construct a valid English sentence using the words "fungus", "treat", and "enzyme".
Write a summary of the article "The Impact of Social Media on Student Stress".
Identify the tone of the following statement: "Do it or you will regret it".
Rewrite the following text in an active voice: "The apples were picked by me".
Compare Hitler's rise to power and Stalin's rise to power.

Given a data set, analyze the pattern and provide a descriptive label or name. x-axis: 0, 2, 4
y-axis: 0, 4, 8

Generate a story about a grandmother traveling to the moon.
Create a recipe for cherry cheesecake.

List three steps for starting a blog.
List two types of artificial intelligence.
Explain why Pavlovian conditioning does not always work.
